name: Je respire où tu palpites
description:
A very short adventure illustrating the poem of Victor Hugo of the same title. Mixing walk in nature and love story, it's up to you to interpret this poem and this game. In a setting both simplistic and intimate, open your mind to this classic of French literature and let you rock under the songs of birds.

Thanks for playing my first game ! And don't hesitate to share your opinion.

(PS: I took the music from the game "GRIS" called "Debris", the rest is homemade.)
